headline: Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH): Assessing Valuation After a Sharp Short-Term Share Price Rebound
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NCLH) has quietly pushed higher, with the stock up about 7% in the past week and nearly 27% over the past month, catching renewed investor attention. See our latest analysis for Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings. That recent 1 month share price return of 26.59%, on top of a sharp 1 day move, stands in contrast to a negative year to date share price return. This hints that sentiment is recovering, even though the 1 year total shareholder return is still in the red...
